author: Max Greenwood
title: Democrats hit Scott over agenda in new ads | TheHill
description: The Democratic National Committee is out with a new set of ads knocking Sen. Rick Scott (R-Fla.)...
content: The Democratic National Committee is out with a new set of ads knocking Sen. Rick Scott (R-Fla.) over a recently released memo laying out what he thinks the GOP agenda should be if Republicans recaptâ€¦ [+1588 chars]
